name: Garry Kasparov
quote: If you wish to succeed, you must brave the risk of failure.

name: Bobby Fischer
quote: I like the moment when I break a man's ego.

name: Garry Kasparov
quote: Tactics involve calculations that can tax the human brain, but when you boil them down, they are actually the simplest part of chess and are almost trivial compared to strategy.

name: Garry Kasparov
quote: The highest art of the chessplayer lies in not allowing your opponent to show you what he can do.

name: Bobby Fischer
quote: I don't believe in psychology. I believe in good moves.

name: Garry Kasparov
quote: The ability to work hard for days on end without losing focus is a talent. The ability to keep absorbing new information after many hours of study is a talent.

name: Victor Kortchnoi
quote: Those who think that it is easy to play chess are mistaken. During a game a player lives on his nerves, and at the same time he must be perfectly composed.

name: Jose Raul Capablanca
quote: You may learn much more from a game you lose than from a game you win. You will have to lose hundreds of games before becoming a good player.

name: Emanuel Lasker
quote: When you see a good move, look for a better one.

name: Fred Reinfeld
quote: The Pin is mightier than the sword.

name: Mikhail Tal
quote: You must take your opponent into a deep dark forest where 2+2=5, and the path leading out is only wide enough for one.

name: Savielly Tartakower
quote: All Chess players should have a hobby.
